name: Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission
summary: The Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission feature introduces an efficient and flexible

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.latencyLongThreshold or                   EUtranCellFDD.latencyLongThreshold
parameters.description: The value of parameter depends on whether the Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission                 feature is activated or not. If it is activated, a higher value must be set to allow                 for a number of RLC poll retransmissions.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.dlMaxRetxRrcReleaseThr
parameters.description: If the Optimized RRC Connection Release Control is activated, the parameter can                 replace the SignalingRadioBearer.dlMaxRetxThreshold parameter of                 the Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission feature.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.dlMaxRetxRrcReleaseThr
parameters.description: If the Optimized RRC Connection Release Control is activated, the parameter can                 replace the SignalingRadioBearer.dlMaxRetxThreshold parameter of                 the Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission feature.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.tPollRetxRrcReleaseDl
parameters.description: If the Optimized RRC Connection Release Control is activated, the                 parameter can replace the                   SignalingRadioBearer.tPollRetransmitDl parameter of the                 Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission feature.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.tPollRetxRrcReleaseDl
parameters.description: If the Optimized RRC Connection Release Control is activated, the                 parameter can replace the                   SignalingRadioBearer.tPollRetransmitDl parameter of the                 Adaptive RLC Poll-Retransmission feature.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012018 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012018 MO instance.
